Name: Pathogen: Survival
About the game: Pathogen: Survival is a wave based FPS zombie game that prioritises progression, customisation and freedom for different playstyles and includes: - 18 upgradable abilities earned through in game currency - 18 unique weapons earned through your character level - 100s of unique skins, applicable to each attachment and element of the weapon, allowing for over 5 trillion possible skins for each weapon - Character skin customisation - Round based purchasable attachments - Round based upgradable weapons, with 4 unique abilities (Fire, Ice, Blackhole, Electricity) - 4 zombie types, normal, spitter, giant, butcher - 7 Unique maps - Dash ability - Adrenaline ability - Time Warp ability - 5 Hero Classes - Weapon and Character Prestige levels
